review: Prepare your guns,and be ready to shoot zombies with non-stop action
This is a awesome game,a little bit of a rage when you die at times,but overall a good game
this game is awesome,you guys should buy this game,there are a few of gamemodes,such as hunger games,ttt(Trouble In Terrorist Town)
i recommend to people who is a fan of Call Of Duty Black Ops 2/cod bo2 as this game really looks like it
i reccomend to people who likes guns and weapons
it is a awesome game,many weapons
